content: this is a summary of a legal text regarding a court judgment in ljubljana the case involved the division of a škoda octavia car between two expartners the court ruled that each party will receive half of the car the court also recognized joint ownership of certain movable and immovable properties and declared the applicant as the owner of a specific immovable property the defendant authorized the registration of the property in the applicants name the court determined that each party will be responsible for their own costs incurred during the legal proceedings the judgment can be appealed within 30 days and the appeal must be submitted to the ljubljana high court the appeal must state the grounds for the appeal and be signed by the appellant a court fee must be paid when lodging the appeal
